Key Match Events: Mihail Caimacov scored a stunning goal with a curling drive that flew into the top corner of the net
Ion Nicolaescu scored a penalty conversion after being sent to the spot
Pre-Game Insights: Malta's coach Michele Marcolini was forced to leave out influential midfielder Teddy Teuma who failed to fully recover from an injury he picked up with his club Stade Reims
Post-Match Reflections: Malta's coach Michele Marcolini said that the loss was a major blow to their promotion hopes
The team will now have to beat Andorra in La Vella on Tuesday to keep their hopes alive
Miscellaneous Highlights: Malta was shorn of some key personnel such as defensive duo Enrico Pepe and Steve Borg and influential midfielder Teddy Teuma
The match was played in Chisinau on Saturday
Others: The UEFA Nations League match was played between Moldova and Malta in League D Group 2
